ygData.subject: RE: Jaxan's and meditation
ygData.msgSnippet: Lets put this Jaxan s thread to rest once and for all...J.M. has confirmed that there is absolutely no affect or relation whatsoever between the Jig and Manna
ygData.messageBody:
Lets put this Jaxan's thread to rest once and for all...J.M. has confirmed
that there is absolutely no affect or relation whatsoever between the Jig
and Manna restoration. Don't mean to be curt as you probably were not
following the thread when this was revealed - but I don't want us to start
flogging a dead horse again.

CheerS!

Faras Tar'Linedhel

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omega8 [mailto:omega8@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 9:54 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Jaxan's and meditation
>
>
> From: "Omega8" <omega8@...>
>
> Recently I had this same experience with a Ranger... who,
> when grouped with
> my party, insists on one of our bards singing Jaxa's Jig during her
> meditation. She claims it greatly speeds her mana regeneration.
>
> Personally I think it's her imagination.
>
>
